etymology.description: Pictogram: image of a baby with a large head and spread arms; legs wrapped in a blanket.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts a swaddled baby with a prominent head and outstretched arms. Over time the figure was stylized into the modern form while still evoking an infant.

examples.chinese: 他是我唯一的儿子(他是我唯一的兒子)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì wǒ wéiyī de érzi.

examples.chinese: 她抱起孩子(她抱起孩子)。
这个孩子三岁了(這個孩子三歲了)。
examples.english: This child is three years old.
